subject: Suits and Litigation
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Banks that came to the rescue of Fred Wilpon after Bernard L. Madoff was arrested in 2008 are owed hundreds of millions of dollars by the Mets’ owner.
snippet: Banks that came to the rescue of Fred Wilpon after Bernard L. Madoff was arrested in 2008 are owed hundreds of millions of dollars by the Mets’ owner.
